attributes.additional_details: Considering the rampant Health & Safety laws in Britain, how can airlines be allowed to cram passengers into seats so tightly that it would be virtually impossible for the average passenger to locate ,let alone remove ,a life jacket from beneath his/her seat & to carry out a controlled evacuation.The government needs to enforce the airline operators to provide adequate legroom on all flights that serve members of the British public with strict Health & Safety policy.
